languages.text: "Наши сердца трепещут от возможности угодить вам, Госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Пусть эта мудрая машина помогает вам в ваших делах".
"Our hearts flutter at the opportunity to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! May this sagacious machine assist you in your endeavours."
languages.original_text: "Наши сердца трепещут от возможности угодить вам, Госпо{mf|дин|жа}! Пусть эта мудрая машина помогает вам в ваших делах".

traits.locale_text: "Our hearts flutter at the opportunity to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! May this sagacious machine assist you in your endeavours."
"Our hearts flutter at the opportunity to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! May this sagacious machine assist you in your endeavours."

"Our hearts flutter at the opportunity to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! May this sagacious machine assist you in your endeavours."

languages.text: “来自上界的大人啊，能有机会取悦您，我们的心颤抖不已！愿这台贤明的机器为您提供有用的建言。”
languages.original_text: "Our hearts flutter at the opportunity to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! May this sagacious machine assist you in your endeavours."

traits.locale_text: “来自上界的大人啊，能有机会取悦您，我们的心颤抖不已！愿这台贤明的机器为您提供有用的建言。”

languages.text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}を喜ばせる機会に、私たちの心は高鳴っております！この賢明なる機械が、あなたの使命の助けとなりますように」
languages.original_text: "Our hearts flutter at the opportunity to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! May this sagacious machine assist you in your endeavours."

traits.locale_text: 「天の{mf|君|姫}を喜ばせる機会に、私たちの心は高鳴っております！この賢明なる機械が、あなたの使命の助けとなりますように」

languages.text: «¡Nuestros corazones se llenan de júbilo ante la oportunidad de complacer a {mf|nuestro Señor|nuestra Señora} Celestial! Esperamos que este sagaz artilugio le sirva bien en todos sus empeños».
languages.original_text: "Our hearts flutter at the opportunity to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! May this sagacious machine assist you in your endeavours."

traits.locale_text: «¡Nuestros corazones se llenan de júbilo ante la oportunidad de complacer a {mf|nuestro Señor|nuestra Señora} Celestial! Esperamos que este sagaz artilugio le sirva bien en todos sus empeños».

languages.text: "Semavi {mf|Lordumuzu|Leydimizi} memnun edişimiz karşısında kalplerimiz pır pır ediyor! Bu bilge makine, uğraşlarınızda yardımcınız olsun."
languages.original_text: "Our hearts flutter at the opportunity to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! May this sagacious machine assist you in your endeavours."

traits.locale_text: "Semavi {mf|Lordumuzu|Leydimizi} memnun edişimiz karşısında kalplerimiz pır pır ediyor! Bu bilge makine, uğraşlarınızda yardımcınız olsun."

languages.text: « Nos cœurs se réjouissent à l'idée de vous satisfaire, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! Puisse cette machine sagace vous aider dans vos entreprises. »
languages.original_text: "Our hearts flutter at the opportunity to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! May this sagacious machine assist you in your endeavours."

traits.locale_text: « Nos cœurs se réjouissent à l'idée de vous satisfaire, Votre Céleste Seigneurie ! Puisse cette machine sagace vous aider dans vos entreprises. »

languages.text: "Unsere Herzen jubilieren angesichts der Möglichkeit, {mf|den himmlischen Herrn|die himmlische Herrin} zu erfreuen! Möge Euch diese weise Maschine bei Euren Unternehmungen gute Dienste leisten."
languages.original_text: "Our hearts flutter at the opportunity to please the Celestial {mf|Lord|Lady}! May this sagacious machine assist you in your endeavours."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Herzen jubilieren angesichts der Möglichkeit, {mf|den himmlischen Herrn|die himmlische Herrin} zu erfreuen! Möge Euch diese weise Maschine bei Euren Unternehmungen gute Dienste leisten."
